pullRequest.title: PLANNER-1824 Add constraint provider for Traveling Tournament
pullRequest.bodyText:
Verified correct with assertion score director.
Surprisingly, the performance of CS-D is significantly better than DRL.

commit.message: PLANNER-1824 Add constraint provider for Traveling Tournament

nodes.bodyText: Does this change have any impact on the DRL performance?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -35,19 +35,19 @@ global HardSoftScoreHolder scoreHolder;
 rule "fourConsecutiveHomeMatches"
     when
         Match($homeTeam : homeTeam, $firstDayIndex : day.getIndex())
-        Match(homeTeam == $homeTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 1)
-        Match(homeTeam == $homeTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 2)
-        Match(homeTeam == $homeTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 3)
+        exists Match(homeTeam == $homeTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 1)
+        exists Match(homeTeam == $homeTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 2)
+        exists Match(homeTeam == $homeTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 3)
     then
         scoreHolder.addHardConstraintMatch(kcontext, -1);
 end
 
 rule "fourConsecutiveAwayMatches"
     when
         Match($awayTeam : awayTeam, $firstDayIndex : day.getIndex())
-        Match(awayTeam == $awayTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 1)
-        Match(awayTeam == $awayTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 2)
-        Match(awayTeam == $awayTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 3)
+        exists Match(awayTeam == $awayTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 1)
+        exists Match(awayTeam == $awayTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 2)
+        exists Match(awayTeam == $awayTeam, day.getIndex() == $firstDayIndex + 3)
